channel.title: Comments on: How I was falsely accused of drug dealing in Amsterdam
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: arielcohen
item.dc:creator: arielcohen
item.description:
I concur the last responder! Amit, you are on the edge! Be carefull! When smoking pot it makes your heart race, your blood pressure can go low, it slows down your reactions, it slows down your ability to learn, you can feel a bit woozy sometimes, or you can even go paranoid. And I also heard that there are also some negative effects!
Me bin on dem Paxil Pills and me is trippen! Wicked, aye, I is now feeling so good I bin jumping around and breakdancing and doing the boogaloo wit me Julie..... Aye!
item.content:encoded:
I concur the last responder!
Amit, you are on the edge! Be carefull! When smoking pot it makes your heart race, your blood pressure can go low, it slows down your reactions, it slows down your ability to learn, you can feel a bit woozy sometimes, or you can even go paranoid. And I also heard that there are also some negative effects!

Me bin on dem Paxil Pills and me is trippen! Wicked, aye, I is now feeling so good I bin jumping around and breakdancing and doing the boogaloo wit me Julie….. Aye!

item.title: By: xtreeq
item.dc:creator: xtreeq
item.description: I would like to post a link I posted on a previous thread: http://www.satlan.co.il/ and say that if it looks like a cat smells like a cat then it must be a cat.
item.content:encoded:
I would like to post a link I posted on a previous thread:
http://www.satlan.co.il/
and say that if it looks like a cat smells like a cat then it must be a cat.
